title: Promo Glitch?
body: Went into my promos won my first game lost my second and it said i was unsuccessful in my promos and dropped me down to 75Lp..  wtf??

replies.body: did you disconnect or dodge a champ select?
true i did dc for like 5 mins, half way through, didn't know it canceled out your series though..
counts as a loss if you dc in champ select, not in game
na i only dced in game
